nodes.name: getPayoff

params.assetId: id of the asset to which the claim (i.e. eventId) relates
params.eventId: id of the specific contractual event for which the total balance paid should be retrieved

getPayoff(bytes32,uint256).return: cashflowId, address of the token used to payoff the claim, current balance of the claim

params.assetId: id of the asset to which the claim (i.e. eventId) relates
params.eventId: id of the specific contractual event for which the total balance paid should be retrieved

getPayoffBalance(bytes32,uint256).return: current balance paid off for the given claim

isOwner().return: true if `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract.

registerPayment(bytes32,int8,uint256,add.details: can only be called by the whitelisted payment router

params.amount: the amount transferred with the payment
params.assetId: id of the asset to which the claim (i.e. eventId) relates
params.cashflowId: id of the claim which is serviced with the payment
params.eventId: id of the specific contractual event which is serviced with the payment
params.token: the address of the token contract from which tokens are transferred with the payment

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.

setPaymentRouter(address).details: can only be called by the owner of the contract

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

getPayoff(bytes32,uint256).notice: retrieve the full details of amounts paid for servicing a specific claim

getPayoffBalance(bytes32,uint256).notice: retrieve the total balance (sum over all amounts) paid for servicing a specific claim

registerPayment(bytes32,int8,uint256,add.notice: register a payment made for servicing a claim from a specific financial asset

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setPaymentRouter(address).notice: whitelists the address of the payment router for registering payments
